html:
{{ doc.company }}
{{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{{ _("Customer") }}: {{ doc.customer_name }}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }}{%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.get_formatted("rate") }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if not row.included_in_print_rate -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ _("Net Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total") }}
{{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{% if doc.get("taxes", filters={"included_in_print_rate": 1}) %}

Taxes Included:

{%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if row.included_in_print_rate -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount_after_discount_amount", doc) }}
{%- endif -%}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: POS Invoice

html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Payment Advice")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Voucher Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Reference / Cheque No."), doc.cheque_no), (_("Reference / Cheque Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date)) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("This amount is in full / part settlement of the listed bills") }}:

{%- for label, value in ( (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("References"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}
Prepared By
Authorised Signatory
Received Payment as Above
_____________
A/C Payee
_____________
{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date) }}
{{ doc.pay_to_recd_from }}
{{ doc.total_amount_in_words }}
{{ doc.get_formatted("total_amount") }}
name: Cheque Printing Format

html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Credit Note")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Credit To"), doc.pay_to_recd_from), (_("Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("Remarks"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("For") }} {{ doc.company }},



{{ _("Authorized Signatory") }}
name: Credit Note

html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Offer Letter

html:
Purchase Order
{{doc.name}}

{{doc.supplier_name}}
{% if doc.address_display %}
{{doc.address_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.contact_display %}
{{doc.contact_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.contact_mobile %}
{{doc.contact_mobile}}
{%- endif -%}
{{doc.transaction_date}}
{{doc.customer_name}}
{% if doc.shipping_address_display %}
{{doc.shipping_address_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.customer_contact_display %}
{{doc.customer_contact_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.customer_contact_mobile %}
{{doc.customer_contact_mobile}}
{%- endif -%}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Name Description Qty Rate Amount
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_name }} {% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
Item Code: {{ row.item_code}} {%- endif %}
{{ row.description }}
 {{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }} {{ row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{doc.total}}
{{doc.grand_total}}
{{doc.in_words}}
name: Drop Shipping Format

html:
{{letter_head or "glava"}}

{{doc.select_print_heading or "Račun"}}

{{doc.name}}

{{doc.customer_name}}
{{doc.address_display or ""}}
{%if frappe.db.get_value("Customer",doc.customer,"tax_id")is not none-%}
Davčna št.: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer",doc.customer,"tax_id")or "/"}}
{%endif%} {%if doc.po_no is not none-%}
št. naročila kupca: {{doc.po_no or ""}}
Datum: {{doc.get_formatted("po_date")}}
{%endif%}
{{doc.get_formatted("posting_date")}}
{{doc.get_formatted ("due_date")}}
{{doc.get_formatted("datum_storitve")}}
{%if doc.sales_order|length==11%}
{{ doc.sales_order }}
{%endif%}
{%if doc.delivery_note|length==13%}
{{ doc.delivery_note }}
{%endif%}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
# Vrsta blaga oz. storitev Količina EM Cena na enoto Popust Vrednost v EUR
{{row.idx}}
{{row.item_code}}:{% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%} {{row.item_name}}{%- endif %}
{{row.qty}}
{{row.uom or row.stock_uom}}
{{row.get_formatted("rate")|replace("€","")}}
{{ row.get_formatted("discount_percentage")}}
{{row.get_formatted("amount")|replace("€","")}}
{{doc.terms}}
{{ doc.get_formatted("total")| replace("€","") }}
{% if doc.additional_discount_percentage != 0 -%}
{{doc.additional_discount_percentage}}
{{ doc.get_formatted("base_discount_amount")| replace("€","") }}
{% endif -%}
{% if doc.total_taxes_and_charges != 0 -%}
{{ doc.get_formatted("total_taxes_and_charges")| replace("€","")}}
{%endif%}
{% if doc.total_advance !=0 -%}
{{doc.get_formatted("total_advance")| replace("€","")}}
{{ doc.get_formatted("outstanding_amount")| replace("€","")}}
{%else-%}
{{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total")| replace("€","")}}
{%endif%}
{% if doc.total_advance !=0 -%}
{{doc.sales_order or ""}}
{%endif%} {% if doc.outstanding_amount==0 -%}
{%- for row in doc.items-%} {{row.get_formatted("sales_order_date")}}{%endfor%}
{%else%}
Plačilo poravnajte na račun {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company,"Trr") }}, odprt pri Banka Koper, d.d.
Pri plačilu navedite Sklic:{{ doc.name | replace("RA-2016-", "00 2016") }}
{%endif%}
{%if doc.delivery_note|length>13 or doc.sales_order|length>11%}
Referenčni dokumenti:
{{doc.sales_order}}
{{doc.delivery_note}}
{%endif%}
{{footer}}
name: Racun

html:
{{ company }}
{{ __("POS No : ") }}{{offline_pos_name}}

{{ __("Date") }}: {{ dateutil.global_date_format(posting_date) }}

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
{{ __("Item") }} {{ __("Qty") }} {{ __("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_name }} {{ format_number(item.qty, precision("difference")) }}
@ {{ format_currency(item.rate, currency) }}		 {{ format_currency(item.amount, currency) }}
{% for row in taxes %} {% if not row.included_in_print_rate %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if discount_amount %} {% endif %}
{{ __("Net Total") }} {{ format_currency(total, currency) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ format_currency(row.tax_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Discount") }} {{ format_currency(discount_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Grand Total") }} {{ format_currency(grand_total, currency) }}
{{ __("Paid Amount") }} {{ format_currency(paid_amount, currency) }}

{{ terms }}

{{ __("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: Point of Sale
